I've been hearing Background
Glory was known as G7-81 and was one of many Synths rescued by the Railroad. She initially worked with High Rise at Ticonderoga, but was eventually called into the Railroad HQ and promoted to a heavy agent in the same year. She took Tommy Whispers under her wing in 2281
